name: OR_CASE_QUEST_AN_P
description: The OR_CASE_QUEST_AN_P table contains OR management system case procedure questionnaire answers.

columns.name: OR_CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the procedure answer.

columns.name: PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the procedure record for which there is an answer.

columns.name: PROC_ID_PROC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the surgical procedure record.
